R

Reader - Class in com.stripe.stripeterminal
The Reader is a representation of a physical reader device.
ReaderCallback - Interface in com.stripe.stripeterminal
PaymentIntentCallback is an interface for callbacks that will receive a Reader under the success case, and an Exception under the failure case.
ReaderEvent - Enum in com.stripe.stripeterminal
A ReaderEvent represents any of the possible events you can receive from a connected reader.
ReaderFragment - Class in com.stripe.example
The ReaderFragment is where the user is able to connect and disconnect from readers.
ReaderFragment() - Constructor for class com.stripe.example.ReaderFragment
 
ReaderInputListener - Interface in com.stripe.stripeterminal
The ReaderInputListener should be implemented to handle events from the reader that occur while accepting input.
ReaderInputOptions - Class in com.stripe.stripeterminal
The ReaderInputOptions represents the set of ReaderInputOptions.ReaderInputOptions currently available to your user.
ReaderInputOptions.ReaderInputOption - Enum in com.stripe.stripeterminal
A ReaderInputOption represents any of the input methods available to your user when the reader begins waiting for input.
ReaderInputPrompt - Enum in com.stripe.stripeterminal
A ReaderInputPrompt represents any of the possible prompts to emitted by the reader as it is accepting input.
ReaderList - Class in com.stripe.example
The ReaderList is a simple class that will statically hold any readers that have been found.
ReaderList() - Constructor for class com.stripe.example.ReaderList
 
ReaderList.ReaderSelectionListener - Interface in com.stripe.example
A simple listener interface that classes can implement to be notified of updates to the reader list.
ReaderSelectionActivity - Class in com.stripe.example
The ReaderSelectionActivity shows the list of recognized readers and allows the user to select one to connect to.
ReaderSelectionActivity() - Constructor for class com.stripe.example.ReaderSelectionActivity
 
ReaderSelectionFragment - Class in com.stripe.example
The ReaderSelectionFragment shows the list of nearby readers and allows for one to be selected for connection.
ReaderSelectionFragment() - Constructor for class com.stripe.example.ReaderSelectionFragment
 
readSource() - Method in class com.stripe.stripeterminal.Terminal
Reads a payment method with the given parameters and returns a Stripe source.
registerListener(ReaderList.ReaderSelectionListener) - Static method in class com.stripe.example.ReaderList
Register a listener that will be informed whenever the nearby readers list is updated
retrievePaymentIntent(String, PaymentIntentCallback) - Method in class com.stripe.stripeterminal.Terminal
Retrieves a PaymentIntent with a client secret.
RetrievePaymentIntentRequest - Class in com.stripe.stripeterminal
 
RetrievePaymentIntentRequest(String, Headers) - Constructor for class com.stripe.stripeterminal.RetrievePaymentIntentRequest
